analyzed: dhamma anuloma paccanīya tika duka paṭṭhāna pāḷi
sani dassana ttika kāma avacara duka

original: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ kāmāvacaraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nakāmāvacaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: anidassana appaṭigham kāmāvacaram dhammam paṭicca na sa nidassana sappaṭighaḥ na kāmāvacaraḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ nakāmāvacaraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho nanakāmāvacaro
analyzed: anidassana appaṭigham na kāmāvacaram dhammam paṭicca na anidassana appaṭighaḥ na na kāmāvacaraḥ

original: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …pe… anidassanaappaṭighaṁ nakāmāvacaraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca
analyzed: dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā pe anidassana appaṭigham na kāmāvacaram dhammam paṭicca

original: nasanidassanasappaṭigho nanakāmāvacaro ca naanidassanasappaṭigho nanakāmāvacaro ca
analyzed: na sa nidassana sappaṭighaḥ na na kāmāvacaro ca na a nidassana sappaṭighaḥ na na kāmāvacaro ca

original: dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā cha, adhipatiyā cha …pe… ārammaṇe
analyzed: dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā cha adhipatiyā cha pe ārammaṇe
